snippet: Israel’s appropriation of nearly 1,000 acres of Palestinian territory has again illustrated the distance between the Israelis and the Palestinians months after the breakdown of American-brokered talks.
abstract: Israeli government lays claim to nearly 1,000 acres of Palestinian territory in West Bank, prompting storm of international criticism and blunt call from United States to reverse the decision; episode again illustrates distance between Israelis and Palestinians months after breakdown of American-brokered peace talks and after a bloody war between Hamas and Israel.
lead_paragraph: Israel’s appropriation of nearly 1,000 acres of Palestinian territory has again illustrated the distance between the Israelis and the Palestinians months after the breakdown of American-brokered talks.

headline.main: New Emblem of an Elemental Conflict: Seized West Bank Land
headline.print_headline: New Emblem of an Elemental Conflict: Seized West Bank Land
